name: Super Cubibloxy
description:
Lexy and Aiscia found themself in Cubitopia, the city of the Cubibloxy race. The King of Cubitopia trow a challenge to the brave adventurer and in an heartbeat, Lexy found herself ascending the All-Cubic Tower, a tower full of puzzle for her to solve. Will she succede and get the treasure at the end?

Super Cubibloxy is the sequel to Cubibloxy, a story-driven puzzle game where the objective is to push blocks and reach the exit.
